sourcing.instructions: Cs (Cesium): Obtain from specialty chemical suppliers or online platforms that sell rare elements. P (Phosphorus): Available at chemical supply stores. S (Sulfur): Purchase from chemical supply stores or online. V (Vanadium): Obtain from metal suppliers or online chemical supply platforms.
steps: Cs (Cesium): Obtain from specialty chemical suppliers or online platforms that sell rare elements. P (Phosphorus): Available at chemical supply stores. S (Sulfur): Purchase from chemical supply stores or online. V (Vanadium): Obtain from metal suppliers or online chemical supply platforms.

1. Weigh each ingredient accurately using a scale. 2. In a fume hood, combine 30 g of Cs with 5 g of P in a glass beaker. 3. Gradually add 40 g of S while stirring continuously. 4. Finally, incorporate 15 g of V into the mixture and continue stirring until a uniform consistency is achieved.

Gradually add 40 g of S while stirring continuously. 4. Finally, incorporate 15 g of V into the mixture and continue stirring until a uniform consistency is achieved.

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid sample from the crucible. 2. If necessary, use sandpaper to smooth any rough edges. 3. Optionally, apply a sealant to enhance surface durability and prevent oxidation.
